Title: Wheel of Fortune
Plot: Said and Arif go to Warden Glynn about Lalar's murder. Angry and full of rage, Said then confronts White about passing drugs. Unsatisfied with White's response, Said beats White severely, which gets Said thrown in the hole. Chucky Pancamo's condition worsens. On orders from Schillinger, Winthrop gets into a fight with Guenzel. Schillinger goes to with a deal, he'll let Beecher work for him delivering mail to Keller if Beecher has Guenzel transferred to Gen Pop so Schillinger can have him. Keller
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, nudity, sex scenes & offensive language.
GuestStars: Anne Meara, Kevin Conway, Mike Doyle, Sandra Purpuro, Joel West, Andy Powers, Toni Lewis
